user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Amazon shopping cart with three items. The cart includes a Logitech G933 wireless headset for $139.99 and an Apple MacBook Pro for $554.99. There are options to delete items, save them for later, or compare with similar items. The user is prompted to proceed to checkout and can also choose to send the items as gifts. The screen also indicates limited stock for both products.
history_actions: click on the "Chrome" browser app icon located at the lower right part of the screen.
click on the browser's address/URL bar located at the middle and top part of the screen.
click on the second search suggestion located at middle and upper part of the screen.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
click on the search bar located at the upper middle part of the screen.
action_plan: Click on the search bar located at the upper middle part of the screen.
Type 'MacBook Air' in the search bar and press the search icon.
Browse through the search results and select the 'MacBook Air' to add to the cart.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Click on the search bar located at the upper middle part of the screen.
